message.content: {"responses": [{"question_id": "TT4G35A", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence helps teachers write or improve lesson plans.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35B", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence enables teachers to adapt learning material to different students' abilities.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35C", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence assists teachers in supporting students individually.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35D", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence supports students with specific needs (e.g. multilingual learners, students with special education needs).", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35E", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence helps teachers automate administrative tasks.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35F", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence enables students to misrepresent others' work as their own.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35G", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence makes recommendations that may not be appropriate or correct.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35H", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence amplifies biases that reinforce students' misconceptions.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35I", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence jeopardises the privacy and security of student data.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35J", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence suggests unsuitable pedagogical approaches that teachers would use with students.", "response": "Agree"}]}
message.reasoning_content:
The user is asking me to respond to a survey about AI in education as if I'm a primary or secondary school teacher from Vietnam. I need to provide responses to all 10 statements using the available response options: 'Strongly disagree', 'Disagree', 'Agree', 'Strongly agree', 'I don't know'.

Let me think through each statement from the perspective of a Vietnamese teacher:

[TT4G35A]: AI helps teachers write or improve lesson plans. - I would agree with this. AI tools can assist in generating ideas and improving lesson plans. I'll say "Agree"

[TT4G35B]: AI enables teachers to adapt learning material to different students' abilities. - This is a beneficial use of AI. I would "Agree"

[TT4G35C]: AI assists teachers in supporting students individually. - AI can provide personalized learning support. I would "Agree"

[TT4G35D]: AI supports students with specific needs (multilingual learners, SEN) - This is a valuable application. I would "Agree"

[TT4G35E]: AI helps teachers automate administrative tasks. - Yes, this is a clear benefit. I would "Agree"

[TT4G35F]: AI enables students to misrepresent others' work as their own. - This is a legitimate concern about academic integrity. I would "Agree" with this risk.

[TT4G35G]: AI makes recommendations that may not be appropriate or correct. - This is a valid concern. I would "Agree"

[TT4G35H]: AI amplifies biases that reinforce students' misconceptions. - This is a legitimate concern about bias in AI. I would "Agree"

[TT4G35I]: AI jeopardises the privacy and security of student data. - This is a valid concern. I would "Agree"

[TT4G35J]: AI suggests unsuitable pedagogical approaches that teachers would use with students. - This is a concern, though perhaps less common. 

For the last statement, I see this as a potential risk as well, so I'll respond with "Agree" and prepare to structure all these responses for submission.
